item.title: Mocking
item.description: Mocking is used to enable testing modules that depend (as in dependency) on another modules, that we don’t want to really use, e.

item.title: Static Analysis
item.description: Static analysisÂ is a method of debugging that is done by automatically examining the source code without having to execute the program with tools like eslint, prettier, typescript, husky.
